title: Omicron cases up to 70% less likely to need hospital stay, says England health body
content:
1. Omicron cases up to 70% less likely to need hospital stay, says England health body  Financial Times
  2. The latest on the coronavirus pandemic and Omicron variant: Live updates  CNN
  3. Don’t dismiss Omicron as ‘mild’. Take it from a Covid long-hauler  The Guardian
  4. COVID-19 omicron variant is less likely to put people in the hospital, studies suggest  Fox News
  5. Early studies suggest a reduced risk of Covid-19 hospitalization when infected with Omicron compared to Delta  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Omicron cases up to 70% less likely to need hospital stay, says England health body  Financial Times
The latest on the coronavirus pandemic and Omicron variant: Live updates  CNN
Don’t dismiss Omicron as ‘mild’. Take it from a Covid long-hauler  The Guardian
COVID-19 omicron variant is less likely to put people in the hospital, studies suggest  Fox News
Early studies suggest a reduced risk of Covid-19 hospitalization when infected with Omicron compared to Delta  CNN

localize.title: オミクロン症例は入院を必要とする可能性が最大70％低い、イングランドの医療機関が発表
英格兰卫生机构表示，欧米茄病例需要住院治疗的可能性最多减少70%。
英格蘭衛生機構表示，歐米茄病例需要住院治療的可能性最多減少70%。
